body:
Sadly for some, summer has come to an end. People may have started school last week, may be starting school sometime this week, or next week. I just wanted to know what grade you guys are going into and if you're excited! 

Im going into 9th grade and I'm  most likely going to take the honorary award for shortest freshman LOL. RIP summer
body_tagged:
Sadly for some, summer has come to an end. People may have started school last week, may be starting school sometime this week, or next week. I just wanted to know what grade you guys are going into and if you're excited! 

Im going into 9th grade and I'm  most likely going to take the honorary award for shortest freshman LOL. RIP summer
title: School
